title: Toshmuhammad Qori-Niyoziy
summary: Toshmuhammad Qori-Niyoziy (Uzbek Cyrillic: Тошмуҳаммад Ниёзович Қори-Ниёзий, Russian: Ташмухамед Ниязович Кары-Ниязов, Tashmukhamed Niyazovich Kary-Niyazov; 2 September [O.S. 21 August] 1897 — 17 March 1970) was an Uzbek mathematician and historian who served as the first president of the Academy of Sciences of the Uzbek SSR.
